domain_url.title: Domain URL
domain_url.description: Your Marketo Base URL. See the docs for info on how to obtain this.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your Marketo developer application. See the docs for info on how to obtain this.

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your Marketo developer application. See the docs for info on how to obtain this.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.
